title: Психологини на карантине
overview: One type of person during the period of quarantine and self — isolation goes into hibernation, and the second-on the contrary, life is full and busy. Heroines of the exclusive issue of the series "Psychologini", which can be viewed on the online service more.tv for free, undoubtedly belong to the second type: Tanya, Vika and Alina are not only actively engaged in professional activities, helping themselves and others, but also live a full and eventful life.The exclusive issue of "Psychologini in quarantine" is entirely shot and mounted using Zoom. In front of their computer screens, the heroines of the audience's favorite series, performed by Anastasia Panina, Anna Starshenbaum and Sofia Kashtanova, will joke and sympathize, quarrel and make friends, play sports and go on online dates.
